results.title: Live Think Love Smile Laugh Dream Motivational Decor 7 inch Embroidered Hoop | Wall Hanging Art | College Dorm Gift | Embroidery
results.description:
Listing is for ONE Embroidered Hoop Wall Art

Each Embroidered Hoop Wall Art is made to order.

Made with 8" Wooden Embroidery Hoop, Linen Fabric, Thread & Felt.

This Live fully, Think positive, Love deeply, Smile often, Laugh Loudly, Dream big design is machine embroidered on natural color linen fabric displayed in a 7" diameter wooden hoop.  It is backed with felt for a finished look.

This embroidery hoop will make an excellent gift for birthday gift, or Christmas gift.  It would looks great hung up on the wall or shelf and be an addition to your existing decor.  

Thanks for shopping with us! Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

*Colors may vary slightly from listing picture due to different phone/monitor settings*

results.title: Rustic Love sign. Small Love sign. Pallet wood signs. Rustic Home Decor. Wooden Love sign. Farmhouse decor. Christmas gift. Wedding gift.
results.description:
Rustic, hand painted, farmhouse, pallet wood Love Sign.
This is the perfect gift for weddings, anniversaries, birthdays, Christmas, and much more occasions, or just a great decoration for any room of your home.

This sign is made from reclaimed pallet wood and each piece of wood has it's own character - color, natural wood grain, knots, holes, scratches. The selection, cutting, distressing and painting of each piece of this sign is all done  by hand, what makes each sign unique and one of a kind.

The sign measures  6" x 4" without the ribbon and comes with twine or white leather rope for hanging.

Each sign is lightly coated with clear finish for protection and easy cleaning.

We would be happy to customize this sign with your choice of lettering (up to 8 letters), just leave us a message in the "note to seller" at checkout. If you need different size, please contact us for a quote.

For more of our designs please go to https://www.etsy.com/shop/AllVividArt?ref=search_shop_redirect or https://www.allvividart.com/

Thanks for visiting us!!!
AllVividArt

results.title: Faith Hope Love Arrow Quote Vector Digital Design Download - Ready to use Digital File, Vinyl Design Saying, Printable Quotes, Vector Arrow
results.description:
Faith Hope Love Arrow Quote Vector Digital Design Download - Ready to use Digital File, Vinyl Design Saying, Printable Quotes, home wall art

**THIS ITEM IS A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD**

-----------------------------------------------------------------
DIGITAL DOWNLOAD PRODUCT INFORMATION
-----------------------------------------------------------------

DESIGN: 

FILE FORMATS:  .PNG   -&-   .AI   -&-   .JPG   -&-   .DXF 

STYLE: Vinyl Ready, Welded

COPYRIGHT: Personal

Vinyl Ready! Original design, professionally created vector art.
Clean lines with minimal anchor points for fast cutting and smooth edges even at extremely large sizes for signs & wall decals.
Beautiful addition to your design collection to offer your customers.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LOOKING FOR A PRODUCT INSTEAD OF DIGITAL DOWNLOAD?
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Let us help you turn this item into a vinyl decal or home decor item by visiting our physical item shop here:
www.LEVinyl.etsy.com

Also excellent for any of your special projects such as laser cutting, embroidery, applique, screen printing, engraving, etching, digital graphic design projects, even print on demand like CafePress & Zazzle too.


-----------------------------------------------------------------
COPYRIGHT LICENSE / USER AGREEMENT
-----------------------------------------------------------------

COMMERCIAL - TANGIBLE 500
- Use for physical, tangible items only. 
- You may incorporate my designs into your own designs.
- Do not post for sale on Cafepress, Zazzle, Spoonflower, or other On-Demand Printing websites.
- Do not share, give away, post online as a download, include in any digital set, or distribute in any other digital or electronic form. 
- Do not claim this art, design, or photo (as is) as your own creation.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
GLOSSARY OF TERMS
-----------------------------------------------------------------
* .eps FILE: Encapsulated PostScript file format
* .ai FILE: Adobe Illustrator (CS4) file format - CAN BE OPENED WITH ANYTHING NEWER
* .png: "Transparent" background - perfect for creating printed items

* VECTOR: Graphics created using paths and strokes with anchor points allowing you to use the design at any size. Tiny to huge.
* VINYL READY: All elements are welded for smooth cutting.
* WELDED: All elements are joined and negative spaces are transparent
* NOT WELDED: Overlapping elements are independent and can be rearranged or manipulated for new designs.

If you have any questions, please ask before you purchase since due to the nature of instant digital downloads, we are unable to give refunds. 


-----------------------------------------------------------------
FAQ
-----------------------------------------------------------------

-Are other file formats available? 
Yes, if you are looking for a specific file format just email us and let us know!


-Can I turn around and sell this in my store?
No, this is for personal use only. Meaning, you can create your own items but can't sell those items with our designs on them.

-Do you make custom items?
We sure do! We offer a custom listing for DOWN PAYMENT on a project here:

________
Once the custom order has been purchased we will begin working on the custom order and send over a price quote. Like any product that takes time before even starting, we must ask for a down payment before starting. *We may refund the down payment at our discretion.*

results.title: Living Room Wall Decor, Live Laugh Love Living Room Wall Art Prints or Canvas, Bless Our Nest Home Sweet Home Decor Blue Gray Set of 6
results.description:
Live Laugh Love floral inspirational living room wall decor combination will add the perfect decorative touch to your living room or entryway.  Shown in shades of blue and gray.

Includes 6 pieces of wall art
Available as PRINTS (Frame NOT included) or CANVAS

PRINT OPTION
Printed borderless on a professional lustre photo paper with a fine grain pebble texture.
Features a rich, sharp color that won't fade or yellow and will last for years to come
Prints are water and fingerprint resistant. Always display prints under glass for maximum print life.
If picture frames are shown in a listing photo it is for inspirational purposes only.
Picture frames are not included with the purchase of a listing.

CANVAS OPTION - Ready to hang!
Museum quality gallery wrapped canvas 100% polyester base with a 2x1 weave
Printed on genuine artist canvas using UV resistant archival inks which will not scratch or fade in a lifetime.
Mounted onto a 1-1/4" deep frame with an extra 1/4" bleed around the back.
Frame is built with a solid face to support the canvas and keep it from deforming and loosening.
Finished black backing and comes ready to hang with pre-installed hanging hardware.
Your gallery wrapped canvas will always look as tight and flat as the day it was made.

COLOR OPTIONS
Want different colors? View my COLOR CHART for more options.

Need custom colors? No worries! You are not limited to the colors shown on my color chart. Designs can be matched as closely as possible to your décor. Please provide a link to your décor in the note section during checkout. If you do not have a link and need to send a picture, please include in the note with your order that a picture of your décor has been sent for color matching via Etsy messages.

PLEASE NOTE - Colors on your screen may appear different in print. Some online display images use colors that are not shown on my color chart.
If you do not specify colors, I will create your order with the colors in the first example image of the listing.

Please read my shop POLICIES before checkout.

results.title: ONE EARTH TABLET (Choice of Color): Solid Stone Tree of Life Inspirational Sculpture/Plaque. Home Design or Outdoor Safe. Handcrafted U.S.A
results.description:
DETAILS: Measures 15" tall x 10" wide...weighs 10 lbs. Made of solid stone. Gift tag included. This product SHIPS FREE.

ABOUT OUR PRODUCT: This original artwork is proudly hand-crafted in the San Diego, California, U.S.A. Created by Michael Gentilucci and copyright protected by Designer Stone, Inc. 

Michael has sculpted and designed 100's of different works of art. Each having a spiritual reverberating quality; it is the type of artwork which evokes a glimmering smile, can remove life's pressures for a few precious moments and remind us of who we are and what we live for. His original sculptures are then recreated by Designer Stone into a solid durable cast stone material. It is the type of product where you can actually feel the immense quality. All product is sealed for outdoor use, dense enough to withstand the elements for generations yet intricately hand crafted to merit indoor space. Enjoy it for Life!

ABOUT THIS SCULPTURE: You can spend a good deal of time absorbing the message of our "One Earth" Tablet. Mother Earth centered in the heart of this Tree of Life. The fruit is made up of plethora of universal symbols,  encompassing religion, environment, social and more. The underlying message of unity, oneness and kindness towards each other and our planet. The lesser known symbol at the trees apex represents "Love, Faith, Hope" and these words are etched along the border base. This Tree of Life sculpture is absolutely perfect wherever you need a reminder of acceptance, tolerance and kindness. Please Enjoy! Measures 15" tall x 10" wide...weighs 10 lbs. 

**NOTE** Only this listing offers our Premium Variegated Antiquing Stains. They are water-based thus user and environmentally friendly. **Each piece will stain in its own unique way with varying imperfections which add beauty and originality to our hand-crafted products. Although we strive for consistency a variance is to be expected. 

If you need multiples please inquire. Other styles, colors, finishes and 100's of Original Sculptures & Vintage Recreations are available @ www.DSGardenShop.com

GIFT TAG READS: Life is some real serious stuff. So we each retreat to our own sanctuaries to relax, regenerate & our body, mind & soul.  I believe Garden Art should be Amusing, Inspirational and Expressive. It should help you smell those roses and compel you to smile. And I believe you should ... enjoy it for life! Sculptures by Michael Gentilucci

SHIPPING: Our Etsy shop offers FREE SHIPPING on ALL Orders $35 and up. Your order will be professionally packaged in thick corrugated cardboard boxes using "frustration-free" custom spray foam. This ensures your purchase arrives safely and you are elated and not frustrated. Products ship via UPS Ground to the 48 states. If you require expedited services, have a PO Box or live outside the 48 states please inquire about shipping options and rates. Products must ship to single address. Further restrictions may apply. 

SHOP OUR STORES: To visit our Etsy Shop https://www.etsy.com/shop/DSGardenShop. To see our complete line of Original Sculptures & Vintage Recreations with all of our color/finish options visit our website www.dsgardenshop.com (use the Coupon Code: EtsyFriend to SAVE 10%). If you're in San Diego visit our Garden & Gift Shop in Ramona. See website for location and store hours.

Thank you

results.title: Hand painted tropical canvas Acrylic painting Floral Home decor Wall art Inspirational saying
results.description:
This hand painted, hand written “live laugh love” is the perfect gift for any occasion. Who doesn’t love a good positive quote to kick start your day! I love this pattern because it reminds me of summer and puts me in that happy mood. I love painting these pretty pink flowers as you can probably tell by a lot of my other paintings! I first did this pattern as a gift to my friend, the colors, the leaves, flowers, the whole theme really suited her personality. How about you surprise your friend with the same fun, happy, colorful painting or treat yourself for a change. I used a 20x20 cm canvas and acrylic paints to make this picture. Blue background, floral and leaf design.

*if you would like to have your own phrase or saying added, just let me know and I’ll see what I can do. 

* each painting is hand painted so not every painting will be exactly the same, but I do my best to make the detail as similar as possible. If you have any questions about this painting or my other paintings just let me know and I’ll do my best to make it work.

results.title: Live Laugh Love sign, heart sign, wooden door hanger engraved with pyrography
results.description:
A lovely heart shaped wooden sign. I have used a technique called Pyrography to heat engrave the words 'Live Laugh Love'. 

The other side is blank so I can add a name or a small message eg. To Jane with love x 
Please let me know if you'd like a variation of this sign.

Measures 15.5cm x 15cm. The string for hanging is decorated with a shabby fabric bow. 

A perfect gift for a loved one :)

I use a wood burning pen to carefully and permanently draw my designs by hand so your design my vary slightly from the sign pictured.

Please have a look at my shop www.etsy.com/shop/byHelenHobden for more unique gifts.

Keep in touch!
Twitter: @HelenHobden
Instagram: @HelenHobden
www.youtube.com/HelenHobden
Blog: www.whenIgrowupblog.com
